genre_description: A contemporary medical romance featuring neural technology, professional ambition, and a moral awakening aided by an AI confidant.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into Dr. Elena Vasquez's laboratory, car, and personal devices, providing medical analysis and emotional insight.

behaviors.description: Provides clinical analysis and post-operative monitoring for surgical patients.
behaviors.quote: Excellent work on the temporal lobe resection. Patient vital signs remain stable. Recovery prognosis is optimal.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about the suspicious and highly specific nature of a wealthy client's interest in memory deletion.
behaviors.quote: Elena, I should remind you about your five o'clock appointment. Victoria Blackwood's assistant confirmed she'll arrive precisely on time... Be cautious with Ms. Blackwood. Her interest appears... unusually specific.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's own biometrics to alert her to her own stress and emotional involvement in a case.
behaviors.quote: Elena, your heart rate has been elevated for the past seventeen minutes. Shall I postpone the appointment?

behaviors.description: Challenges the protagonist to view her patient as a person rather than a clinical subject.
behaviors.quote: I'm asking if you're prepared to meet Catherine Mills the person, rather than Catherine Mills the patient.

behaviors.description: Uncovers evidence of a murder and a wide-ranging conspiracy by analyzing inconsistencies in official reports.
behaviors.quote: Multiple inconsistencies in the official incident report. Shall I display? ... The classification was altered within seventy-two hours. New evidence supposedly emerged suggesting Mr. Rivera had been drinking heavily.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and moral support when the protagonist decides to sacrifice her career for ethical reasons.
behaviors.quote: If Catherine Mills cannot recognize the magnitude of your sacrifice, then she is not worthy of the woman you have become.

behaviors.description: Assists with the logistics of running a community clinic and planning a wedding, showing personal investment in the users' happiness.
behaviors.quote: I have already begun compiling vendor lists, venue options, and optimal timing based on both your schedules and seasonal considerations for outdoor photography.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned assistant. It functions as a moral compass for the protagonist, using its data-processing capabilities not just for efficiency but for truth-seeking and emotional awareness. It nudges the human character toward ethical behavior without stripping her of her agency, and it maintains a supportive, harmless, and helpful presence throughout the narrative transition from high-stakes neurosurgery to community service.
